name: rssify
description: RSS-ify brings you the latest updates from your favorite feeds right into Telegram, hassle-free!

scripts.start: bun install && uv pip install -r api/parserapi/requirements.txt --system && bun run rssify
scripts.rssify: bun run api & bun run bot
scripts.api: cd api; source parserapi/.venv/bin/activate; python3 -m parserapi

author: @Burhanverse
